meanings: Noun 英, 금기어, 속어 꼴 보기 싫은[재수 없는] 놈
Noun 英, 금기어, 속어 (형용사와 함께 쓰여) 놈[새끼]
Verb 英, 금기어, 속어 망할 놈의[빌어먹을] 것
Noun 톱 (→chainsaw, circular saw, fretsaw, hacksaw, handsaw, jigsaw)

examples.korean: It was Sod’s Law—the only day he could manage was the day I couldn’t miss work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소드 법칙이라더니, 그가 간신히 시간을 낼 수 있는 단 하루가 나로서는 일을 쉴 수가 없는 날이었어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was Sod’s Law—the only day he could manage was the day I couldn’t miss work. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Which were divided into five sectors - Utah, Omaha, Gold, Juno, and Sword Beaches. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 해안들은 유타, 오마하, 골드, 주노, 소드 등 다섯 구역으로 나뉘었다. TIMES CORE
